Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Methods
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.freeplane.api.Map
    since 1.7.10 - use MindMap instead
    org.freeplane.api.MapRO
    since 1.7.10 - use MindMapRO instead
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.Map
    since 1.7.10 use Proxy.MindMap
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.MapRO
    since 1.7.10, use Proxy.MindMapRO
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.freeplane.api.Attributes.remove​(String)
    before 1.1 - use Attributes.remove(int) or Attributes.removeAll(String) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.AttributesRO.findAttribute​(String)
    since 1.2 - use AttributesRO.findFirst(String) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.AttributesRO.get​(String)
    before 1.1 - use AttributesRO.get(int), AttributesRO.getFirst(String) or AttributesRO.getAll(String) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.AttributesRO.getAttributeNames()
    since 1.2 use #getNames() instead.
    org.freeplane.api.Controller.getOpenMaps()
    since 1.7.10 - use Controller.getOpenMindMaps()
    org.freeplane.api.Controller.load​(File)
    since 1.7.5 - use Controller.mapLoader(File)
    org.freeplane.api.Controller.newMap()
    since 1.7.10 - use Controller.newMindMap()
    org.freeplane.api.Controller.newMapFromTemplate​(File)
    since 1.6.16 - use Controller.mapLoader(File)
    org.freeplane.api.Controller.setStatusInfo​(String, Icon)
    since 1.2 - use Controller.setStatusInfo(String, String, String)
    org.freeplane.api.ExternalObject.setURI​(String)
    since 1.2 - use ExternalObject.setUri(String) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.ExternalObjectRO.getURI()
    since 1.2 - use ExternalObjectRO.getUri() instead.
    org.freeplane.api.HeadlessLoader.getMap()
    since 1.7.10 - use HeadlessLoader.getMindMap()
    org.freeplane.api.HeadlessLoader.load()
    since 1.7.10 - use HeadlessLoader.getMindMap()
    org.freeplane.api.HeadlessMapCreator.load​(File)
    since 1.7.5 - use HeadlessMapCreator.mapLoader(File)
    org.freeplane.api.Icons.addIcon​(String)
    since 1.2 - use Icons.add(String) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.Icons.removeIcon​(String)
    since 1.2 - use Icons.remove(String) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.Link.set​(String)
    since 1.2 - use Link.setText(String) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.LinkRO.get()
    since 1.2 - use LinkRO.getText() instead.
    org.freeplane.api.MindMap.setFilter​(boolean, boolean, NodeCondition)
    use filter
    org.freeplane.api.MindMapRO.getRootNode()
    since 1.2 - use MindMapRO.getRoot() instead.
    org.freeplane.api.NodeRO.getMap()
    since 1.7.10 - use NodeRO.getMindMap()
    org.freeplane.api.NodeRO.getNodeID()
    since 1.2 - use Node.getId() instead.
    org.freeplane.api.NodeRO.getParentNode()
    since 1.2 - use NodeRO.getParent() instead.
    org.freeplane.api.NodeRO.getPlainTextContent()
    since 1.2 - use getPlainText() or getTo().getPlain() instead.
    org.freeplane.api.NodeStyle.setNodeTextColor​(Color)
    since 1.2 - use NodeStyle.setTextColor(Color) instead.
    org.freeplane.api.NodeStyleRO.getNodeTextColor()
    since 1.2 - use NodeStyleRO.getTextColor() instead.
    org.freeplane.core.util.HtmlUtils.isHtmlNode​(String)
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.Connector.setEndArrow​(ArrowType)
    since 1.2 - use Connector.setEndArrow(boolean) instead
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.Connector.setStartArrow​(ArrowType)
    since 1.2 - use Connector.setStartArrow(boolean) instead
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.ConnectorRO.getEndArrow()
    since 1.2 - use ConnectorRO.hasEndArrow() instead
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.ConnectorRO.getStartArrow()
    since 1.2 - use ConnectorRO.hasStartArrow() instead
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.ControllerRO.find​(ICondition)
    since 1.2 use ControllerRO.find(NodeCondition) instead.
    org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy.Proxy.NodeRO.find​(ICondition)
    since 1.2 use NodeRO.find(NodeCondition) instead.
